results.title: First Reported Case of Rhabdomyolysis Associated with Concomitant Use of Cyclosporin, Diltiazem, and Simvastatin
results.text_hl: Here, we present a case of @DISEASE_Rhabdomyolysis @DISEASE_MESH:D012206 @@@rhabdomyolysis@@@ due to a rare drug-to-drug interaction of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Diltiazem @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004110 @@@diltiazem@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Cyclosporine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D016572 @@@cyclosporin@@@ in a @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Glomerulonephritis_IGA</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005922 @@@IgA nephropathy@@@.

citations.NLM: Fuah KW, Lim C. First Reported Case of Rhabdomyolysis Associated with Concomitant Use of Cyclosporin, Diltiazem, and Simvastatin Indian J Nephrol. 2021 Mar-Apr;31(2):173-175. PMID: 34267441
